verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה׀ <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei Now these [are] the kings הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, of the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִכּ֤וּ <WH5221> hik-Ku smote בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַיִּֽרְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> vai-yir-Shu and possessed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> 'ar-Tzam, their land בְּעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan מִזְרְחָ֣ה <WH4217> miz-re-Chah toward the rising הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-Sha-mesh; of the sun מִנַּ֤חַל <WH5158> min-Na-chal from the river אַרְנוֹן֙ <WH769> 'ar-nOn Arnon עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far הַ֣ר <WH2022> har unto mount חֶרְמ֔וֹן <WH2768> cher-Mon, Hermon וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעֲרָבָ֖ה <WH6160> ha-'a-ra-Vah and all the plain מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah. on the east

סִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> si-chOn Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev who dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> be-chesh-Bon; in Heshbon מֹשֵׁ֡ל <WH4910> mo-Shel [and] ruled מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <WH6177> me-'a-ro-'Er from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> se-fat- which [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <WH5158> Na-chal of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <WH769> ar-Non Arnon וְת֤וֹךְ <WH8432> ve-Toch and from the middle הַנַּ֙חַל֙ <WH5158> han-Na-chal of the river וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and from half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad, Gilead וְעַד֙ <WH5704> ve-'Ad far יַבֹּ֣ק <WH2999> yab-Bok Jabbok הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> han-Na-chal, even unto the river גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul [which is] the border בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> am-Mon. of Ammon

וְהָעֲרָבָה֩ <WH6160> ve-ha-'a-ra-Vah And from the plain עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far יָ֨ם <WH3220> yam to the sea כִּנְר֜וֹת <WH3672> kin-Rot of Chinneroth מִזְרָ֗חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah, on the east וְ֠עַד <WH5704> Ve-'ad far יָ֣ם <WH3220> yam and unto the sea הָעֲרָבָ֤ה <WH6160> ha-'a-ra-Vah of the plain יָם־ <WH3220> yom- sea הַמֶּ֙לַח֙ <WH4417> ham-Me-lach [even] the salt מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah, on the east דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech the way בֵּ֣ית beit הַיְשִׁמ֑וֹת <WH1020> hay-shi-Mot; to Bethjeshimoth וּמִ֨תֵּימָ֔ן <WH8486> u-Mit-tei-Man, and from the south תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat the foot אַשְׁדּ֥וֹת <WH794> ash-Dot of the slopes הַפִּסְגָּֽה׃ <WH6449> hap-pis-Gah. of Pisgah

וּגְב֗וּל <WH1366> u-ge-Vul, And the coast ע֚וֹג <WH5747> og of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan מִיֶּ֖תֶר <WH3499> mi-Ye-ter [which was] of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֑ים <WH7497> ha-re-fa-'Im; of the giants הַיּוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <WH6252> be-'ash-ta-Rot at Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <WH154> u-ve-'ed-Re-'i. and at Edrei

וּ֠מֹשֵׁל <WH4910> U-mo-shel And reigned בְּהַ֨ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount חֶרְמ֤וֹן <WH2768> cher-Mon Hermon וּבְסַלְכָה֙ <WH5548> u-ve-sal-Chah and in Salcah וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan, and in all Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul unto the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <WH1651> hag-ge-shu-Ri of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <WH4602> ve-ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti; and the Maachathites וַחֲצִי֙ <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad, Gilead גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul the border סִיח֥וֹן <WH5511> si-Chon of Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king חֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <WH2809> chesh-Bon. of Heshbon

מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Them did Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הִכּ֑וּם <WH5221> hik-Kum; smite וַֽ֠יִּתְּנָהּ <WH5414> Vai-yit-te-nah gave מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh and Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God יְרֻשָּׁ֗ה <WH3425> ye-rush-Shah, it [for] a possession לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <WH7206> la-ru-'u-ve-Ni unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <WH1425> ve-lag-ga-Di, and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> ve-la-cha-Tzi and the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> Ham-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei And these [are] the kings הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the country אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הִכָּ֨ה <WH5221> hik-Kah smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' which Joshua וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver on this side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> hai-yar-Den Jordan יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah, on the west מִבַּ֤עַל mib-Ba-'al גָּד֙ <WH1171> gad from Baalgad בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <WH1237> be-vik-'At in the valley הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> hal-le-va-Non, of Lebanon וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- far הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> ha-Har even unto the mount הֶחָלָ֖ק <WH2510> he-cha-Lak Halak הָעֹלֶ֣ה <WH5927> ha-'o-Leh that goeth up שֵׂעִ֑ירָה <WH8165> se-'I-rah; to Seir וַיִּתְּנָ֨הּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nah gave יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' which Joshua לְשִׁבְטֵ֧י <WH7626> le-shiv-Tei unto the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְרֻשָּׁ֖ה <WH3425> ye-rush-Shah [for] a possession כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <WH4256> ke-mach-le-ko-Tam. according to their divisions

בָּהָ֣ר <WH2022> ba-Har In the mountains וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <WH8219> u-vash-she-fe-Lah, and in the valleys וּבָֽעֲרָבָה֙ <WH6160> u-va-'a-ra-Vah and in the plains וּבָ֣אֲשֵׁד֔וֹת <WH794> u-Va-'a-she-Dot, and in the springs וּבַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> u-vam-mid-Bar and in the wilderness וּבַנֶּ֑גֶב <WH5045> u-van-Ne-gev; and in the south country הַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> ha-chit-Ti the Hittites הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, the Amorites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> ve-hak-ke-na-'a-Ni and the Canaanites הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> hap-pe-riz-Zi, the Perizzites הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusites פ Peh

מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king יְרִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> ye-ri-Cho of Jericho אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; one מֶ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king הָעַ֛י <WH5857> ha-'Ai of Ai אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which מִצַּ֥ד <WH6654> mitz-Tzad which [is] beside בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֖ל <WH1008> 'el Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king חֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> chev-Ron of Hebron אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king יַרְמוּת֙ <WH3412> yar-Mut of Jarmuth אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king לָכִ֖ישׁ <WH3923> la-Chish of Lachish אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king עֶגְלוֹן֙ <WH5700> 'eg-lOn of Eglon אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king גֶּ֖זֶר <WH1507> Ge-zer of Gezer אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king דְּבִר֙ <WH1688> de-Vir of Debir אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king גֶּ֖דֶר <WH1445> Ge-der of Geder אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king חָרְמָה֙ <WH2767> cha-re-Mah of Hormah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king עֲרָ֖ד <WH6166> 'a-Rad of Arad אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king לִבְנָה֙ <WH3841> liv-Nah of Libnah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king עֲדֻלָּ֖ם <WH5725> 'a-dul-Lam of Adullam אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king מַקֵּדָה֙ <WH4719> mak-ke-Dah of Makkedah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֖ל <WH1008> 'el of Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king תַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <WH8599> tap-Pu-ach of Tappuah אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king חֵ֖פֶר <WH2660> Che-fer of Hepher אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king אֲפֵק֙ <WH663> 'a-Fek of Aphek אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king לַשָּׁר֖וֹן <WH8289> lash-sha-Ron of Lasharon אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one
מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king מָדוֹן֙ <WH4068> ma-dOn of Madon אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king חָצ֖וֹר <WH2674> cha-Tzor of Hazor אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king שִׁמְר֤וֹן shim-Ron מְראוֹן֙ <WH8112> me-r-'On of Shimronmeron אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king אַכְשָׁ֖ף <WH407> 'ach-Shaf of Achshaph אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king תַּעְנַךְ֙ <WH8590> ta'-naCh of Taanach אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> me-gid-Do of Megiddo אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king קֶ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6943> ke-desh of Kedesh אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king יָקְנֳעָ֥ם <WH3362> ya-ke-no-'Am of Jokneam לַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3760> lak-kar-Mel of Carmel אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king דּ֛וֹר <WH1756> Dor of Dor לְנָפַ֥ת <WH5299> le-na-Fat in the coast דּ֖וֹר <WH1756> Dor of Dor אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> go-Yim of the nations לְגִלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> le-gil-Gal of Gilgal אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king תִּרְצָ֖ה <WH8656> tir-Tzah of Tirzah אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; one כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim all the kings שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim thirty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ve-'e-Chad. and one פ Peh
